ygData.subject: Re: How to be a necro-healer (was:RE: Athren's Guide on how to solo as a Bard)
ygData.msgSnippet: My main character is a Necro and their heal is worth nothing maybe a bit in the early levels but that s about it. The recast time is extremly long on it and it
ygData.messageBody:
My main character is a Necro and their heal is worth nothing maybe a bit in
the early levels but that's about it. The recast time is extremly long on it
and it heals so little hp. It's worthless just about the higher level one is
a little better though still you don't get it until level 49 and it is only
equal to a greater heal.

Naeeldar

-----Original Message-----
From: Rokenn Swiftsong <rokenn@...>
To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Wednesday, October 13, 1999 5:47 AM
Subject: [eqbards] How to be a necro-healer (was:RE: Athren's Guide on how
to solo as a Bard)


>From: "Rokenn Swiftsong" <rokenn@...>
>
>Actually Necro's can heal, it is just VERY mana inefficient. You use Dark
>Empathy to transfer your HP's to the person needing healing, then you use
>your Lifetap line to heal yourself :) BTW I find playing my Necro is a lot
>of fun when I get tired of Barding. It is nice to have a pet that does not
>need recharming every 15 secs lol.
>
>Rokenn Swiftsong - Karana server
>Master Craftsmen of Societus Argenti
>
>
>>From: James Schuldes <jgs@...>
>>
>>Looking forward to other exciting titles:
>>
>>How to be a necro-healer.
>>
>>How to be a warrior-wizzard.
>>
>>How to be a good Dark Elf.
>>
>>How to be a Ranger-nuker.
>>
>><just kidding>
>>
>>I think you summed it up right off the bat: "more trouble than it's
worth."
>>Please don't post me back all the excuses for soloing - I have heard them
>>all "not nuff time to play today, nobody understands bard, my reg group is
>>on vacation, my dog bit me..." Solo if you want to but I'd rather be in a
>>good group.
>>
>>Sylly
>>
